img_above_text:
![Wukong MiddleHollow 34.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/13/Wukong_MiddleHollow_34.jpg)
Prepare to deal with a group of Stone Spiders, as another archer posted on a high rock will try to make things difficult, but you can sprint over to find a wooden ramp behind him.
img_below_text:
Up ahead, you'll find another green Wisp along the left wall before reaching the Bonevault Shrine. Wonderful name.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 36.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/69/Wukong_MiddleHollow_36.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:

            Context:

Prepare to deal with a group of Stone Spiders, as another archer posted on a high rock will try to make things difficult, but you can sprint over to find a wooden ramp behind him."
            - Following Text: "Up ahead, you'll find another green Wisp along the left wall before reaching the Bonevault Shrine. Wonderful name.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 36.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/69/Wukong_MiddleHollow_36.jpg)"

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the protagonist in a dark, cavernous area filled with large spider webs and rock formations. The character is preparing to engage with a group of Stone Spiders, with a flaming staff in hand, indicating an imminent battle. The preceding text mentions an archer on a high rock and a wooden ramp behind him, suggesting a tactical approach is needed. The following text hints at the presence of a green Wisp along the left wall before reaching the Bonevault Shrine, indicating the player's next objective.
